## Introduction

Through this article, I am going to explian the technology stack which I used to create Mancala web game, I will explore some code snippts and the internal system archtict. Also, you will find a demo vedio about how you can play.

For more information about Mancala board game <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kalah>.

##1. Project Environment
* Spring Tool Suite 3.8.2.RELEASE
* JDK 1.8
* Apache Maven 3.3.9
* WebSocket (STOMP)

##2. Project Package Structure
* com.backbase.mancala
* Item 2
    + Item 2a
    + Item 2b
